## âœ… **Once You Have Admin Access**

Follow: `docs/META_FACEBOOK_SETUP.md`

**Quick Steps:**
1. Go to https://developers.facebook.com/
2. Create app â†’ Add "Pages" product
3. Get Page Access Token
4. Get Page ID from your Facebook page
5. Add to `.env`:
   ```bash
   META_PAGE_ACCESS_TOKEN=your_token
   META_PAGE_ID=your_page_id
   ```

**That's it!** System will auto-post to Facebook daily.
